hadiths.text: It was narrated from Muhammad bin 'Amr bin 'Ata that Salamah bin Al-Azraq said:"I heard Abu Hurairah say: 'Someone from the family of the Messenger of Allah died, and the women gathered, weeping for him. 'Umar stood up and told them not to do that, and threw them out, but the Messenger of Allah said: Let them be there, O 'Umar, for the eye weeps and the heart grieves, but soon we will join them

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الْبُكَاءِ عَلَى الْمَيِّتِ
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing Weeping for the Deceased
